com.servicediscovery
Class ServiceDiscoveryLayer

java.lang.Object
  com.servicediscovery.ServiceDiscoveryLayer

public class ServiceDiscoveryLayer
extends java.lang.Object

This is the Service discovery layer on the application side. The apps/services will have an instance of service discovery layer and this class interact with the service discovery layer in the android communication process and expose APIs to the application layer

Author:
Parth, Pengcheng

Constructor Detail

ServiceDiscoveryLayer

public ServiceDiscoveryLayer(boolean bool)
Method Detail

registerNewService

public java.lang.String registerNewService(java.lang.String serviceType)
this method will add a service to the service set of the Service discovery layer. It will perform all the checks for a valid service that need to be done. Meanwhile, this will send the intent filter to the android communication process to register

Parameters:
serviceType - The name for the service

getNewServiceId

public java.lang.String getNewServiceId()
Gives a new service id. This is unique across one device

Returns:
serviceID The unique id for the service

sendMessage

public void sendMessage(Message message)
this method generates a string from the message object and then passes it to the multicast layer reliable multicast layer.

Parameters:
message - The message object to be sent out

registerApp

public void registerApp(java.lang.Object appObject,
                        java.lang.String intentfilter,
                        Context context)
Register the application to the service discovery layer on the application side and do some initialization

Parameters:
appObject - A object of the service which will use the Service Discovery Layer.
intentfilter - The intent filter name for the broadcast receiver.
context - The context of the service which will use the Service Discovery Layer.

registerActions

public void registerActions(java.lang.String methodName,
                            java.lang.String actionName,
                            java.lang.Class appClass)
                     throws java.lang.Exception
Register the action to the service so that if the message the service to perform an action, the service discovery layer will do a callback on the registered function

Parameters:
methodName - The method name of the action
actionName - The actual name of the action
appClass - The class object of the service which will use the Service Discovery Layer.
Throws:
java.lang.Exception

registerTriggers

public void registerTriggers(java.lang.String methodName,
                             java.lang.String triggerName,
                             java.lang.Class appClass)
                      throws java.lang.Exception
Register the trigger to the service so that if the message the service to perform an action, the service discovery layer will do a callback on the registered function

Parameters:
methodName - The method name of the trigger
triggerName - The actual name of the trigger
appClass - The class object of the service which will use the Service Discovery Layer.
Throws:
java.lang.Exception

callMethod

public void callMethod(Intent intent)
This will have an intent receiver which will call methods that are registered. like the on receive of the sdlcommon

Parameters:
intent - The intent object which is received from android communication process

getInfo

public java.lang.String getInfo()
This method generate a trigger which can provide the information of this service.

Returns:
A comma-separated string which has all the information about the service
